rawConfiguration.text:
**THE DETAILS IN THIS DASHBOARD ARE ESTIMATES, THE [DATA MANAGEMENT HUB](https://one.newrelic.com/launcher/data-management-nerdlets.data-management-launcher) SHOULD BE USED TO VIEW OFFICIAL INGESTION RATES**

This page analyzes data coming from the various [AWS legacy integrations](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/infrastructure/amazon-integrations/aws-integrations-list/) available in New Relic, which feed into the `Infrastructure integrations` category of the Data Management Hub. Data ingest for these integrations is most easily controlled in the individual service integration's [configuration settings](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/integrations/infrastructure-integrations/cloud-integrations/configure-polling-frequency-data-collection-cloud-integrations/).

Additionally, there is analysis of data coming from [AWS CloudWatch Metric Streams](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/infrastructure/amazon-integrations/aws-integrations-list/aws-metric-stream/), which is reflected in the `Metrics` category of the Data Management Hub and most easily controlled in the individual Metric Stream's [configuration settings](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonCloudWatch/latest/monitoring/CloudWatch-Metric-Streams.html).

*If you find a missing integration, please [open an issue](https://github.com/newrelic/newrelic-quickstarts/issues/new/choose) on our GitHub!*

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT sum(GigabytesIngested) AS '1 DAY (GB)', rate(sum(GigabytesIngested), 1 MONTH) AS '1 MONTH (GB)' FROM NrConsumption WHERE productLine='DataPlatform' AND usageMetric LIKE '%InfraIntegration%' LIMIT MAX SINCE 24 HOURS AGO COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO

SELECT
max(`ALB` + `API Gateway` + `AppSync` + `Athena` + `Auto Scaling` + `Billing` + `CloudFront` + `Cognito` + `Connect` + `Direct Connect` + `DocumentDB` + `DynamoDB` + `EBS` + `EC2` + `ECR/ECS` + `EFS` + `Elastic Beanstalk` + `ElasticSearch` + `ElastiCache` + `ELB` + `Elemental MediaConvert` + `Elemental MediaPackage VOD` + `EMR` + `FSx` + `Glue` + `IAM` + `IoT` + `Kinesis Data Analytics` + `Kinesis Data Firehose` + `Kinesis Data Streams` + `Lambda` + `MSK` + `MQ` + `Neptune` + `NLB` + `QLDB` + `Redshift` + `RDS` + `Route53` + `Route53 Resolver` + `S3` + `SES` + `SNS` + `SQS` + `Step Functions` + `Transit Gateway` + `Trusted Advisor` + `VPC` + `WAF`) AS '1 DAY (GB)',
rate(max(`ALB` + `API Gateway` + `AppSync` + `Athena` + `Auto Scaling` + `Billing` + `CloudFront` + `Cognito` + `Connect` + `Direct Connect` + `DocumentDB` + `DynamoDB` + `EBS` + `EC2` + `ECR/ECS` + `EFS` + `Elastic Beanstalk` + `ElasticSearch` + `ElastiCache` + `ELB` + `Elemental MediaConvert` + `Elemental MediaPackage VOD` + `EMR` + `FSx` + `Glue` + `IAM` + `IoT` + `Kinesis Data Analytics` + `Kinesis Data Firehose` + `Kinesis Data Streams` + `Lambda` + `MSK` + `MQ` + `Neptune` + `NLB` + `QLDB` + `Redshift` + `RDS` + `Route53` + `Route53 Resolver` + `S3` + `SES` + `SNS` + `SQS` + `Step Functions` + `Transit Gateway` + `Trusted Advisor` + `VPC` + `WAF`), 1 MONTH) AS '1 MONTH (GB)'
FROM (
SELECT
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'LoadBalancerSample' AND provider IN ('Alb', 'AlbTargetGroup')) AS 'ALB',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'ApiGatewaySample') AS 'API Gateway',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'AwsAppSyncApiSample') AS 'AppSync',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'AwsAthenaWorkGroupSample') AS 'Athena',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('AutoScalingGroupSample', 'AutoScalingInstanceSample', 'AutoScalingLaunchConfigurationSample', 'AutoScalingPolicySample', 'AutoScalingRegionLimitSample')) AS 'Auto Scaling',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'FinanceSample') AS 'Billing',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'LoadBalancerSample' AND provider = 'CloudFrontDistribution') AS 'CloudFront',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'AwsCognitoUserPoolSample') AS 'Cognito',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('AwsConnectContactFlowSample', 'AwsConnectInstanceSample', 'AwsConnectQueueSample')) AS 'Connect',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('AwsDirectConnectConnectionSample')) AS 'Direct Connect',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('AwsDocDbClusterSample', 'AwsDocDbClusterByRoleSample', 'AwsDocDbInstanceSample')) AS 'DocumentDB',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'DatastoreSample' AND provider IN ('DynamoDbTable', 'DynamoDbRegion', 'DynamoDbGlobalSecondaryIndex')) AS 'DynamoDB',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'BlockDeviceSample' AND provider = 'EbsVolume') AS 'EBS',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'ComputeSample' AND provider = 'Ec2Instance') AS 'EC2',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'ComputeSample' AND provider IN ('EcsService', 'EcsCluster')) AS 'ECR/ECS',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'BlockDeviceSample' AND provider = 'EfsFileSystem') AS 'EFS',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('ElasticBeanstalkEnvironmentSample', 'ElasticBeanstalkInstanceSample')) AS 'Elastic Beanstalk',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'DatastoreSample' AND provider IN ('ElasticsearchCluster', 'ElasticsearchCluster')) AS 'ElasticSearch',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'DatastoreSample' AND provider IN ('ElastiCacheRedisNode', 'ElastiCacheRedisCluster', 'ElastiCacheMemcachedNode')) AS 'ElastiCache',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'LoadBalancerSample' AND provider = 'Elb') AS 'ELB',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('AwsMediaConvertQueueSample', 'AwsMediaConvertOperationSample')) AS 'Elemental MediaConvert',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('AwsMediaPackageVODPackagingConfigurationSample')) AS 'Elemental MediaPackage VOD',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('ElasticMapReduceClusterSample', 'ElasticMapReduceInstanceSample', 'ElasticMapReduceInstanceGroupSample', 'ElasticMapReduceInstanceFleetSample')) AS 'EMR',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'AwsFsxWindowsFileServerSample') AS 'FSx',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'AwsGlueJobSample') AS 'Glue',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'IamAccountSummarySample') AS 'IAM',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('IOTBrokerSample', 'IOTRuleSample', 'IOTRuleActionSample')) AS 'IoT',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('AwsKinesisAnalyticsApplicationSample', 'AwsKinesisAnalyticsTaskSample', 'AwsKinesisAnalyticsTaskOperatorSample', 'AwsKinesisAnalyticsTaskParallelismSample', 'AwsKinesisAnalyticsTaskOperatorParallelismSample')) AS 'Kinesis Data Analytics',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'QueueSample' AND provider = 'KinesisDeliveryStream') AS 'Kinesis Data Firehose',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'QueueSample' AND provider IN ('KinesisStream', 'KinesisStreamShard')) AS 'Kinesis Data Streams',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'ServerlessSample') AS 'Lambda',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('AwsMskClusterSample', 'AwsMskBrokerSample', 'AwsMskTopicSample')) AS 'MSK',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('AwsMqBrokerSample', 'AwsMqQueueSample', 'AwsMqTopicSample')) AS 'MQ',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('AwsNeptuneInstanceSample', 'AwsNeptuneClusterSample', 'AwsNeptuneClusterByRoleSample', 'AwsNeptuneDatabaseClassSample')) AS 'Neptune',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'LoadBalancerSample' AND provider IN ('Nlb', 'NlbTargetGroup')) AS 'NLB',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'AwsQLDBLedgerSample') AS 'QLDB',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'DatastoreSample' AND provider = 'RedshiftSample') AS 'Redshift',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'DatastoreSample' AND provider IN ('RdsDbInstance', 'RdsDbCluster')) AS 'RDS',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('DnsSample', 'HealthCheckSample')) AS 'Route53',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'AwsRoute53ResolverEndpointSample') AS 'Route53 Resolver',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'DatastoreSample' AND provider = 'S3Bucket') AS 'S3',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('SesConfigurationSetSample', 'SesReceiptSample', 'SesRegionSample')) AS 'SES',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'QueueSample' AND provider = 'SnsTopic') AS 'SNS',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'QueueSample' AND provider = 'SqsQueue') AS 'SQS',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('AwsStatesStateMachineSample', 'AwsStatesActivitySample', 'AwsStatesLambdaFunctionSample', 'AwsStatesServiceIntegrationSample', 'AwsStatesServiceSample', 'AwsStatesApiUsageSample')) AS 'Step Functions',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'AwsTransitGatewayTransitGatewaySample') AS 'Transit Gateway',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'TrustedAdvisorSample') AS 'Trusted Advisor',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'PrivateNetworkSample') AS 'VPC',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('AwsWafWebACLSample', 'AwsWafRuleGroupSample', 'AwsWafV2WebACLSample', 'AwsWafV2RuleGroupSample')) AS 'WAF'
FROM 
ApiGatewaySample, AutoScalingGroupSample, AutoScalingInstanceSample, AutoScalingLaunchConfigurationSample, 
AutoScalingPolicySample, AutoScalingRegionLimitSample, AwsAppSyncApiSample, AwsAthenaWorkGroupSample, 
AwsCognitoUserPoolSample, AwsConnectContactFlowSample, AwsConnectInstanceSample, AwsConnectQueueSample, 
AwsDirectConnectConnectionSample, AwsDocDbClusterByRoleSample, AwsDocDbClusterSample, AwsDocDbInstanceSample, 
AwsFsxWindowsFileServerSample, AwsGlueJobSample, AwsKinesisAnalyticsApplicationSample, AwsKinesisAnalyticsTaskOperatorParallelismSample, 
AwsKinesisAnalyticsTaskOperatorSample, AwsKinesisAnalyticsTaskParallelismSample, AwsKinesisAnalyticsTaskSample, AwsMediaConvertOperationSample, 
AwsMediaConvertQueueSample, AwsMediaPackageVODPackagingConfigurationSample, AwsMqBrokerSample, AwsMqQueueSample, 
AwsMqTopicSample, AwsMskBrokerSample, AwsMskClusterSample, AwsMskTopicSample, 
AwsNeptuneClusterByRoleSample, AwsNeptuneClusterSample, AwsNeptuneDatabaseClassSample, AwsNeptuneInstanceSample, 
AwsQLDBLedgerSample, AwsRoute53ResolverEndpointSample, AwsStatesActivitySample, AwsStatesApiUsageSample, 
AwsStatesLambdaFunctionSample, AwsStatesServiceIntegrationSample, AwsStatesServiceSample, AwsStatesStateMachineSample, 
AwsTransitGatewayTransitGatewaySample, AwsWafRuleGroupSample, AwsWafV2RuleGroupSample, AwsWafV2WebACLSample, 
AwsWafWebACLSample, BlockDeviceSample, ComputeSample, DatastoreSample, 
DnsSample, ElasticBeanstalkEnvironmentSample, ElasticBeanstalkInstanceSample, ElasticMapReduceClusterSample, 
ElasticMapReduceInstanceFleetSample, ElasticMapReduceInstanceGroupSample, ElasticMapReduceInstanceSample, FinanceSample, 
HealthCheckSample, IamAccountSummarySample, IOTBrokerSample, IOTRuleActionSample, 
IOTRuleSample, LoadBalancerSample, PrivateNetworkSample, QueueSample, 
ServerlessSample, SesConfigurationSetSample, SesReceiptSample, SesRegionSample, TrustedAdvisorSample
)
SINCE 24 HOURS AGO COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO

FROM
  ApiGatewaySample,
  AutoScalingGroupSample,
  AutoScalingInstanceSample,
  AutoScalingLaunchConfigurationSample,
  AutoScalingPolicySample,
  AutoScalingRegionLimitSample,
  AwsAppSyncApiSample,
  AwsAthenaWorkGroupSample,
  AwsCognitoUserPoolSample,
  AwsConnectContactFlowSample,
  AwsConnectInstanceSample,
  AwsConnectQueueSample,
  AwsDirectConnectConnectionSample,
  AwsDocDbClusterByRoleSample,

  AwsDocDbInstanceSample,

  AwsGlueJobSample,
  AwsKinesisAnalyticsApplicationSample,
  AwsKinesisAnalyticsTaskOperatorParallelismSample,
  AwsKinesisAnalyticsTaskOperatorSample,
  AwsKinesisAnalyticsTaskParallelismSample,
  AwsKinesisAnalyticsTaskSample,
  AwsMediaConvertOperationSample,
  AwsMediaConvertQueueSample,
  AwsMediaPackageVODPackagingConfigurationSample,
  AwsMqBrokerSample,
  AwsMqQueueSample,
  AwsMqTopicSample,
  AwsMskBrokerSample,
  AwsMskClusterSample,
  AwsMskTopicSample,
  AwsNeptuneClusterByRoleSample,
  AwsNeptuneClusterSample,
  AwsNeptuneDatabaseClassSample,
  AwsNeptuneInstanceSample,

  ElasticBeanstalkEnvironmentSample,

  ElasticMapReduceClusterSample,
  ElasticMapReduceInstanceFleetSample,
  ElasticMapReduceInstanceGroupSample,
  ElasticMapReduceInstanceSample,
  FinanceSample,
  HealthCheckSample,
  IamAccountSummarySample,

  LoadBalancerSample,

  QueueSample,
  ServerlessSample,
  SesConfigurationSetSample,
  SesReceiptSample,
  SesRegionSample,
  TrustedAdvisorSample
SELECT uniques(awsAccountId) AS 'Account ID'
SINCE 24 HOURS AGO
LIMIT MAX

SELECT
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'LoadBalancerSample' AND provider IN ('Alb', 'AlbTargetGroup')) AS 'ALB',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'ApiGatewaySample') AS 'API Gateway',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'AwsAppSyncApiSample') AS 'AppSync',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'AwsAthenaWorkGroupSample') AS 'Athena',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('AutoScalingGroupSample', 'AutoScalingInstanceSample', 'AutoScalingLaunchConfigurationSample', 'AutoScalingPolicySample', 'AutoScalingRegionLimitSample')) AS 'Auto Scaling',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'FinanceSample') AS 'Billing',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'LoadBalancerSample' AND provider = 'CloudFrontDistribution') AS 'CloudFront',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'AwsCognitoUserPoolSample') AS 'Cognito',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('AwsConnectContactFlowSample', 'AwsConnectInstanceSample', 'AwsConnectQueueSample')) AS 'Connect',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('AwsDirectConnectConnectionSample')) AS 'Direct Connect',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('AwsDocDbClusterSample', 'AwsDocDbClusterByRoleSample', 'AwsDocDbInstanceSample')) AS 'DocumentDB',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'DatastoreSample' AND provider IN ('DynamoDbTable', 'DynamoDbRegion', 'DynamoDbGlobalSecondaryIndex')) AS 'DynamoDB',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'BlockDeviceSample' AND provider = 'EbsVolume') AS 'EBS',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'ComputeSample' AND provider = 'Ec2Instance') AS 'EC2',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'ComputeSample' AND provider IN ('EcsService', 'EcsCluster')) AS 'ECR/ECS',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'BlockDeviceSample' AND provider = 'EfsFileSystem') AS 'EFS',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('ElasticBeanstalkEnvironmentSample', 'ElasticBeanstalkInstanceSample')) AS 'Elastic Beanstalk',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'DatastoreSample' AND provider IN ('ElasticsearchCluster', 'ElasticsearchCluster')) AS 'ElasticSearch',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'DatastoreSample' AND provider IN ('ElastiCacheRedisNode', 'ElastiCacheRedisCluster', 'ElastiCacheMemcachedNode')) AS 'ElastiCache',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'LoadBalancerSample' AND provider = 'Elb') AS 'ELB',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('AwsMediaConvertQueueSample', 'AwsMediaConvertOperationSample')) AS 'Elemental MediaConvert',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('AwsMediaPackageVODPackagingConfigurationSample')) AS 'Elemental MediaPackage VOD',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('ElasticMapReduceClusterSample', 'ElasticMapReduceInstanceSample', 'ElasticMapReduceInstanceGroupSample', 'ElasticMapReduceInstanceFleetSample')) AS 'EMR',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'AwsFsxWindowsFileServerSample') AS 'FSx',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'AwsGlueJobSample') AS 'Glue',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'IamAccountSummarySample') AS 'IAM',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('IOTBrokerSample', 'IOTRuleSample', 'IOTRuleActionSample')) AS 'IoT',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('AwsKinesisAnalyticsApplicationSample', 'AwsKinesisAnalyticsTaskSample', 'AwsKinesisAnalyticsTaskOperatorSample', 'AwsKinesisAnalyticsTaskParallelismSample', 'AwsKinesisAnalyticsTaskOperatorParallelismSample')) AS 'Kinesis Data Analytics',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'QueueSample' AND provider = 'KinesisDeliveryStream') AS 'Kinesis Data Firehose',

FROM

rawConfiguration.text:
# Available Integrations for Analytics Services

 * [Athena](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/infrastructure/amazon-integrations/aws-integrations-list/aws-athena-monitoring-integration/)
 * [Elasticsearch](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/infrastructure/amazon-integrations/aws-integrations-list/aws-elasticsearch-monitoring-integration/)
 * [EMR](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/infrastructure/amazon-integrations/aws-integrations-list/aws-emr-monitoring-integration/)
 * [Glue](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/infrastructure/amazon-integrations/aws-integrations-list/aws-glue-monitoring-integration/)
 * [Kinesis Data Analytics](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/infrastructure/amazon-integrations/aws-integrations-list/aws-kinesis-data-analytics-monitoring-integration/)
 * [Kinesis Data Firehose](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/infrastructure/amazon-integrations/aws-integrations-list/aws-kinesis-data-firehose-monitoring-integration/)
 * [Kinesis Data Streams](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/infrastructure/amazon-integrations/aws-integrations-list/aws-kinesis-data-streams-monitoring-integration/)
 * [MSK](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/infrastructure/amazon-integrations/aws-integrations-list/aws-managed-kafka-msk-integration/)
 * [Redshift](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/infrastructure/amazon-integrations/aws-integrations-list/aws-redshift-integration/)

nrqlQueries.query:
SELECT
max(
  `Athena` +
  `ElasticSearch` +
  `EMR` +
  `Glue` +
  `Kinesis Data Analytics` +
  `Kinesis Data Firehose` +
  `Kinesis Data Streams` +
  `MSK` +
  `Redshift`
) AS '1 DAY (GB)',
rate(max(
  `Athena` +
  `ElasticSearch` +
  `EMR` +
  `Glue` +
  `Kinesis Data Analytics` +
  `Kinesis Data Firehose` +
  `Kinesis Data Streams` +
  `MSK` +
  `Redshift`
), 1 MONTH) AS '1 MONTH (GB)'
FROM (
SELECT
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'AwsAthenaWorkGroupSample') AS 'Athena',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'DatastoreSample' AND provider IN ('ElasticsearchCluster', 'ElasticsearchCluster')) AS 'ElasticSearch',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('ElasticMapReduceClusterSample', 'ElasticMapReduceInstanceSample', 'ElasticMapReduceInstanceGroupSample', 'ElasticMapReduceInstanceFleetSample')) AS 'EMR',

# Available Integrations for Application Integration Services

 * [MQ](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/infrastructure/amazon-integrations/aws-integrations-list/aws-mq-integration/)
 * [SNS](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/infrastructure/amazon-integrations/aws-integrations-list/aws-sns-monitoring-integration/)
 * [SQS](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/infrastructure/amazon-integrations/aws-integrations-list/amazon-sqs-monitoring-integration/)
 * [Step Functions](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/infrastructure/amazon-integrations/aws-integrations-list/aws-step-functions-monitoring-integration/)

nrqlQueries.query:
SELECT
max(
  `MQ` +
  `SNS` +
  `SQS` +
  `Step Functions`
) AS '1 DAY (GB)',
rate(max(
  `MQ` +
  `SNS` +
  `SQS` +
  `Step Functions`
), 1 MONTH) AS '1 MONTH (GB)'
FROM (
SELECT
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('AwsMqBrokerSample', 'AwsMqQueueSample', 'AwsMqTopicSample')) AS 'MQ',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'QueueSample' AND provider = 'SnsTopic') AS 'SNS',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'QueueSample' AND provider = 'SqsQueue') AS 'SQS',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('AwsStatesStateMachineSample', 'AwsStatesActivitySample', 'AwsStatesLambdaFunctionSample', 'AwsStatesServiceIntegrationSample', 'AwsStatesServiceSample', 'AwsStatesApiUsageSample')) AS 'Step Functions'
FROM 
  AwsMqBrokerSample,
  AwsMqQueueSample,
  AwsMqTopicSample,
  QueueSample,
  AwsStatesStateMachineSample,
  AwsStatesActivitySample,
  AwsStatesLambdaFunctionSample,
  AwsStatesServiceIntegrationSample,
  AwsStatesServiceSample,
  AwsStatesApiUsageSample
)
SINCE 24 HOURS AGO COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO
LIMIT MAX

nrqlQueries.query:

  `DocumentDB` +

  `ElastiCache` +
  `Neptune` +

) AS '1 DAY (GB)',
rate(max(
  `DocumentDB` +
  `DynamoDB` +
  `ElastiCache` +
  `Neptune` +
  `QLDB` +

), 1 MONTH) AS '1 MONTH (GB)'
FROM (
SELECT
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('AwsDocDbClusterSample', 'AwsDocDbClusterByRoleSample', 'AwsDocDbInstanceSample')) AS 'DocumentDB',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'DatastoreSample' AND provider IN ('DynamoDbTable', 'DynamoDbRegion', 'DynamoDbGlobalSecondaryIndex')) AS 'DynamoDB',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'DatastoreSample' AND provider IN ('ElastiCacheRedisNode', 'ElastiCacheRedisCluster', 'ElastiCacheMemcachedNode')) AS 'ElastiCache',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('AwsNeptuneInstanceSample', 'AwsNeptuneClusterSample', 'AwsNeptuneClusterByRoleSample', 'AwsNeptuneDatabaseClassSample')) AS 'Neptune',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'AwsQLDBLedgerSample') AS 'QLDB',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'DatastoreSample' AND provider IN ('RdsDbInstance', 'RdsDbCluster')) AS 'RDS'
FROM
  AwsDocDbClusterSample,
  AwsDocDbClusterByRoleSample,

  AwsNeptuneInstanceSample,
  AwsNeptuneClusterSample,
  AwsNeptuneClusterByRoleSample,
  AwsNeptuneDatabaseClassSample,
  AwsQLDBLedgerSample,
  DatastoreSample
)

LIMIT MAX

SELECT
max(
  `ALB` +

nrqlQueries.query:
SELECT
max(
  `Cognito` +
  `IAM` +
  `WAF`
) AS '1 DAY (GB)',
rate(max(
  `Cognito` +
  `IAM` +
  `WAF`
), 1 MONTH) AS '1 MONTH (GB)'
FROM (
SELECT
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'AwsCognitoUserPoolSample') AS 'Cognito',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() = 'IamAccountSummarySample') AS 'IAM',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('AwsWafWebACLSample', 'AwsWafRuleGroupSample', 'AwsWafV2WebACLSample', 'AwsWafV2RuleGroupSample')) AS 'WAF'
FROM
  AwsCognitoUserPoolSample,
  IamAccountSummarySample,
  AwsWafWebACLSample,
  AwsWafRuleGroupSample,
  AwsWafV2WebACLSample,
  AwsWafV2RuleGroupSample
)
SINCE 24 HOURS AGO COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO
LIMIT MAX

rawConfiguration.text:
This page analyzes data coming from [CloudWatch Metric Streams](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/integrations/amazon-integrations/aws-integrations-list/aws-metric-stream) available in New Relic. Data ingest for this data is most easily controlled in the individual Metric Stream's [configuration settings](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonCloudWatch/latest/monitoring/CloudWatch-Metric-Streams.html).

*Namespace inventory is based on [this list](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonCloudWatch/latest/monitoring/aws-services-cloudwatch-metrics.html) from AWS.*

This page also shows side-by-side comparison of AWS services collected by the legacy integrations and CloudWatch Metric Streams in order to identify possible duplication of data.

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM Metric
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8 AS '1 DAY (GB)',
rate(bytecountestimate()/10e8, 1 MONTH) AS '1 MONTH (GB)'
WHERE collector.name = 'cloudwatch-metric-streams'
SINCE 24 HOURS AGO COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO
LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8 AS '1 DAY (GB)'
WHERE collector.name = 'cloudwatch-metric-streams'
FACET newrelic.cloudIntegrations.providerExternalId AS 'Account ID', newrelic.cloudIntegrations.providerAccountName AS 'Account Name'
SINCE 24 HOURS AGO
LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8 AS 'GB Ingest'
WHERE collector.name = 'cloudwatch-metric-streams'
FACET CASES(
  WHERE aws.Namespace = 'AWS/ACMPrivateCA' AS 'ACM Private CA',
  WHERE aws.Namespace = 'AWS/ApiGateway' AS 'Amazon API Gateway',
  WHERE aws.Namespace = 'AWS/Athena' AS 'Amazon Athena',

  WHERE aws.Namespace = 'AWS/EC2Spot' AS 'Amazon EC2 Spot Fleet',
  WHERE aws.Namespace = 'AWS/EBS' AS 'Amazon Elastic Block Store',

SINCE 7 DAYS AGO
TIMESERIES
LIMIT MAX

FROM
  ApiGatewaySample,
  AutoScalingGroupSample,
  AutoScalingInstanceSample,
  AutoScalingLaunchConfigurationSample,
  AutoScalingPolicySample,

SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8 AS '1 DAY (GB)'
FACET CASES(

widgets.title: CloudWatch Metric Stream Namespaces in Use

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM Metric
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8 AS '1 DAY (GB)'
WHERE collector.name = 'cloudwatch-metric-streams'
FACET CASES(
  WHERE aws.Namespace = 'AWS/AmplifyHosting' AS 'AWS Amplify',
  WHERE aws.Namespace = 'AWS/ApiGateway' AS 'Amazon API Gateway',
  WHERE aws.Namespace = 'AWS/AppRunner' AS 'AWS App Runner',
  WHERE aws.Namespace = 'AWS/AppStream' AS 'AppStream 2.0',
  WHERE aws.Namespace = 'AWS/AppSync' AS 'AWS AppSync',
  WHERE aws.Namespace = 'AWS/Athena' AS 'Amazon Athena',
